coreAtributes.name: Quarian Mask
coreAtributes.description: An alien mask, it filters the air and prevents others from seeing your face.

displacementText.playerSelf: You take off the Quarian Mask.
displacementText.playerNPCRough: You grab hold of [npc.name]'s Quarian Mask and tear it off [npc.her] face.
displacementText.NPCPlayerRough: [npc.Name] grabs hold of your Quarian Mask and roughly tears it off your face.
displacementText.NPCOtherNPCRough: [npc.Name] grabs hold of [npc2.name]'s Quarian Mask and roughly tears it off from [npc2.her] face.

replacementText.playerSelf: You put on the Quarian Mask.
replacementText.playerNPC: You put the Quarian Mask on [npc.name]'s face.
replacementText.playerNPCRough: You hold [npc.name] still as you roughly force the Quarian Mask onto [npc.her] face.
replacementText.NPCPlayer: [npc.Name] puts the Quarian Mask on your face.
replacementText.NPCPlayerRough: [npc.Name] holds you still as [npc.she] roughly forces the Quarian Mask onto your face.
replacementText.NPCOtherNPC: [npc1.Name] puts the Quarian Mask on [npc2.her]'s face.
replacementText.NPCOtherNPCRough: [npc1.Name] holds [npc2.name] still as [npc1.she] roughly forces the Quarian Mask onto [npc2.her] face.
